div.head: 胎氣上沖
div.div: fetal qi that rises and clashes [with the heart]

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: fetal qi that rises and clashes [with the heart]

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zi shang chong xin 子上衝心 , a child rises and clashes with the heart. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：竹瀝，胎氣上沖，煩 躁，日頻飲之 , “Dried bamboo sap: drink several times daily [to cure] fetal qi that rises and clashes [with the heart] , and vexation with restlessness.
